Package pacman

Class YellowGhost

java.lang.Object
pacman.Entity
pacman.YellowGhost
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawing
public class YellowGhost extends Entity implements Drawing
The YellowGhost class represents a yellow ghost entity in the Pacman game. It extends the Entity class and implements the Drawing interface. This ghost walks randomly on the map and has four different directions: up, down, left, and right. It loads images for each direction and can be drawn on a panel using the draw method.

  • Method Details

    • control

      public void control()
      Controls the movement of the YellowGhost. The ghost walks randomly on the map by selecting a random direction as long as the selected direction is not blocked by walls.

    • loadImages

      public void loadImages() throws IOException
      Loads the images for each direction of the YellowGhost.
      Specified by:

      Throws:
